# Basic Storm Controller

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/basic-storm-controller
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T02:12:03.321790

---

A device that creates a simple, [single-phase storm](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite-creative/fortnite-creative-glossary#singlephasestorm).

For details on how to set up this device, see [Basic Storm Controller Devices](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite-creative/using-basic-storm-controller-devices-in-fortnite-creative).
